resources.string: Mary\'s mum has four children. The first child is called April. The second May. The third June. What is the name of the fourth child?
Angelica, who is sixteen years old, is four times as old as her brother. How old will Angelica be when she is twice as old as her brother?

If you rearrange the letters \"LNGEDNA\" you have the name of a(n):
How many four-sided figures appear in the diagram below?
If all Bloops are Razzies and all Razzies are Lazzies, all Bloops are definitely Lazzies?
Which one of the following things is the least like the others?
Select the one which is different from others:

A genius can crack this one in just 10 seconds. Bill Gates is said to have solved it in 20 seconds. Harvard University alumni can do it in 40 seconds. If youâ€™ve found the right answer in two minutes, you are among the 15% of people who are the most intellectually gifted.Here are five different shapes. The question is simple:
You are participating in a race. You overtake the second person. What position are you in?
Lowl your score is below 0, congratulation finding this easter egg!
You missed quite a few, I would recommend you to think twice before doing anything in your life!
Well done, you score is average which means you are a ordinary guy!
Well done, you missed a few, but you definitely are close to be a genius!
Well done, you reached the maximum score!
That\'s wrong, the right answer is Mary!
That\'s wrong, the right answer is 24!
That\'s wrong, the right answer is Country because that\'s England unscrambled!
That\'s wrong, the right answer is 25!
That\'s wrong, the right answer is True!
That\'s wrong, the right answer is Flower!

That\'s wrong, the right answer is the first one because it\'s the only one that is not an odd one out!
If you overtake the second person, and if you take his place, then you are SECOND !
